records.title: Angular Portfolio
records.description: This was my first portfolio but as I identify myself more as a react person nowadays, my portfolio that represents me should be replaced and why not change the layout while at it.

records.title: Predator seeking prey AI
records.description: It was finally time to tackle an AI project. The project resulted in an AI that consists of a neural network and then it learns its environment with the help of a genetic algorithm.

records.title: Korren
records.description: A shared board page app with purpose to replace paper based cleaning schedules for corridors, but can be used for any context where a rotating schedule is needed.

records.title: Spritvis
records.description: Systembolaget does regulary publish documents and graphs about their data. We created a tool for people to themself explore and examine their data.

records.title: OMR
records.description: Image processing is something central in my education and during one course the task was to read notesheets and return a string.

records.title: Animal Approach
records.description: School project done in bachelor degree. This is a social AR game that the players use of their phone to see a playfield that contains object that interferes with their vision so they have to move around the playfield placed on a table creating intresting interactions. For game trailer send me a message.

records.title: Simulation of a twirl
records.description: Schoolproject where goals was to simulate the path and rotation of the kids toy caleld BeyBlade. This project started as a simple model for roation and later elements where added for simulate the path the toy would travel in a halfsphere.

records.title: BatApp
records.description: Managed to create a none destructing voice changer that uses smart sampling method to change pitch of voice to sound as batman. The app is still very fast but not a realtime application if not backed up by good hardware.

records.title: Walking Sim
records.description: The base plan for this project was to create a environment that the player could walk around in and explore. The environment would tell a story of how he ended up where he is and why he is alone. For the time given for this schoolproject the result was very pleasing and we managed to deliver the feeling to the player that we strived for

records.title: Swiper
records.description: This was the first big production I been a part of. We managed to produce a fun game where the user swipes given arrows in the right direction.

records.title: SpaceRockGame
records.description: I wanted to recreate a game i played alot as a child with a player that avoids spacerocks and can fire a lazer at them. If the lazer hits it results with more rocks spawning.
